item.title: Flames and smoke force passengers to flee New York City area train
item.description: Passengers have evacuated a New York City area commuter train after a fire caused at least one car to fill with smoke

item.title: Mother of 2 missing children reindicted with murder after 11 years of psychiatric treatment
item.description: A Maryland woman with a long history of severe mental illness has been rearrested and charged with killing two of her children

item.title: Democratic governors may offer a path forward for a party out of power in Washington

item.title: A Mississippi monkey sanctuary helps veterans with PTSD find peace
item.description: An Army veteran finds peace through a unique bond with a spider monkey named Louie

item.title: Texas Democrats arrive in Illinois to block vote back home on redrawn House maps sought by Trump
item.description: Texas Democrats have left the state in an attempt to prevent the state House from holding a vote Monday on new congressional maps that Republicans hop...
